Content: *p73461ra0820*do not write in this area do not write in this area do not write in this area8  (b) the student varied the distance l between the supports. she used vernier calipers to measure the displacement d for a constant load. she recorded the following data.l /md /m0.9500.01600.8500.01150.7500.00800.6500.00520.5500.00320.4500.0018(i) plot a graph of logd against logl on the grid opposite.use the additional columns for your processed data.(6)
